member.summary: Called when the player right clicks while holding this block/item in his hands
member.param: True when the player pressed the right mouse button on this block. Every subsequent call, while the player holds right mouse down will be false, it gets called every second while right mouse is down
Whether or not to do any subsequent actions. If not set or set to NotHandled, the action will not called on the server.
